hero.title: About Start Ashtanga
hero.subtitle: A community-driven resource for Ashtanga Yoga

mission.title: Our mission
mission.text: Start Ashtanga is a free, open-source, and non-commercial resource dedicated to making Ashtanga Yoga accessible to everyone. We provide clear, beginner-friendly information about Ashtanga Yoga (Mysore style) and traditional yoga studies, helping newcomers find their path and experienced practitioners deepen their understanding, build and connect with each other.

items.title: Accessible
items.description: Free, open, and available to everyone regardless of location, background, or experience level. No paywalls, no gatekeeping.

items.title: Authentic
items.description: Rooted in traditional teachings from the Mysore lineage while being welcoming and approachable to complete beginners.

items.title: Community-driven
items.description: Built by and for the global Ashtanga community. Anyone can contribute content, translations, or improvements.

openSource.title: Built by the community
openSource.text: Start Ashtanga is a collaborative projectâ€”anyone can help improve it. All our content is freely available and we welcome contributions from practitioners around the world.

contribute.title: Ways to contribute
contribute.text: You can help by suggesting corrections, translating content into your language, sharing information about your local shala, or simply spreading the word.

technical.title: For developers
technical.text: This project is open source on GitHub. If you're a developer, you can contribute code, report issues, or help build new features.

contact.title: Get in touch
contact.text: Have questions, suggestions, or feedback? We'd love to hear from you.

cta.title: Ready to begin?
cta.text: Everything you need to start your Ashtanga practice is right here.
